===Etymology===
Japanese simplification of [[圓]], via a simplified character similar to [[𠮚]].<ref>Toshinobu Sakaida, [http://www.akaenpitsu.gr.jp/kakioroshi001.pdf 円（圓）の異体字]</ref>

===Etymology===
''(Yen)'' from {{etyl|cmn|ja}} [[圓]] (''yuán'' "circle" >"round coin") referring to the [[piece of eight]] (compare {{etyl|cmn|-}} ''yuán'' [[元]], Korean ''won'' [[원]]).
